735090.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - 姫衣装替えCGセット～乱世の戦姫～/Princess Costume CG Set - Princess Warriors -
735090.description:
Store specials for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."
A 5 CG set of face graphics for lovely princesses who lived as warriors in a chaotic world where battle never ends.

▼ Additional face graphics
Ginchiyo Tachibana, Kaihime, Lady Otsuya, Chiyome Mochizuki, and Tsuru Ohori.

▼ How to use
These CG are made available in the game via "Edit Historical Officers" and "Edit Created Officers."
For Created Officers, only officers set to "Active" in the "Active/Standby" switch will appear in the game.
For Historical Officers, only officers set to "Apply" in the "Apply/Defer" switch will appear in the game.
735090.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
